DOC.brief_summary: Randomized trial comparing cost effectiveness and efficacy of kyphoplasty vs vertebroplasty for the treatment of painful, osteoporotic vertebral compression fractures.
DOC.brief_title: Cost Effectiveness and Efficacy of Kyphoplasty and Vertebroplasty Trial
DOC.criteria: > or = 50 years of age Compression fracture (T4L5)within previous 12 mo. Pain from compression fracture No malignant tumor No back surgery
